rows.label: tev052601_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: tev052601_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Slovity about the Cavern Clan.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev052601_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss

rows.label: tev052601_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Slovity about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev052601_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask Slovity about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev052601_MSG0001
rows.name:
Cavern Clan was not cowardly like Tree Clan.
Our warriors gave all for clan.
That is why we claimed victory.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev052601_MSG0002
rows.name: I believed that as I took lives of sworn enemies.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev052601_MSG0003
rows.name:
But then Ganglion came. Absorbed my great clan.
Made them another group of warrior slaves.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev052601_MSG0004
rows.name:
Cavern Clan wanted great weapons.
But price was our Prone souls. Bah![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev052601_MSG0005
rows.name:
Now some would gladly die like dogs for Ganglion.
Disgraceful![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev052601_MSG0006
rows.name:
I do not know Cavern Clan anymore.
10,000 suns of fighting. Of sacrifice.
Now it means nothing.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev052601_MSG0009
rows.name:
No enemy dares bother us anymore.
You made sure of that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev052601_MSG0010
rows.name:
I know there are many in this city who hate us.
Especially Tree Clan like Lebora.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev052601_MSG0011
rows.name: But now I know you are different.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev052601_MSG0012
rows.name:
I remember what Ganglion did to my warriors.
They will pay hundredfold![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev052601_MSG0013
rows.name:
I hope you will be there when I do.
Especially since you are only one on my side![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev052601_MSG0014
rows.name:
No enemy dares bother us anymore.
You made sure of that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev052601_MSG0015
rows.name:
But I remember what Ganglion did to my warriors.
They will pay hundredfold![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev052601_MSG0016
rows.name:
Will you join me? We will rampage together!
Cut bloody swath through Ganglion dogs![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev052601_MSG0017
rows.name:
I hear Tree Clan may even be willing to join in.
I almost can't imagine such thing.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev052601_MSG0018
rows.name: You have nice city. It is good to be with many friends.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev052601_SEL1021
rows.name: Ask Slovity about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev052601_SEL1031
rows.name: Ask Slovity about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev052601_MSG0019
rows.name: When you go on attack, city will be defenseless.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev052601_MSG0020
rows.name:
Do not worry. We may not stand by Tree Clan.
But we WILL fight.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev052601_MSG0021
rows.name:
We name many people here friend.
We will keep them safe while you are away.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev052601_MSG0022
rows.name:
So go paint land red with Ganglion blood!
City will be here when you return.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev052601_MSG0040
rows.name: When you go on attack, city will be defenseless.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev052601_MSG0041
rows.name: Do not worry! Both Prone clans will protect city.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev052601_MSG0042
rows.name:
So go paint land red with Ganglion blood!
City will be here when you return.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev052601_MSG0043
rows.name: ...Mmm? Will we start fights with Tree Clan?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev052601_MSG0044
rows.name:
I said not to worry! City is home to all of us.
We can put quarrels aside long enough to defend it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev052601_SEL2011
rows.name: Ask Slovity what she will do next.

rows.label: tev052601_SEL2021
rows.name: Ask Slovity about recent developments.

rows.label: tev052601_MSG2001
rows.name: I will not stop until every member of Ganglion is dead.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev052601_MSG2002
rows.name:
But your chieftain Maurice asked me to be one of you.
Asked me to become BLADE.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev052601_MSG2003
rows.name:
It makes sense. I often find myself fighting with BLADEs.
Why not join for true?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev052601_MSG2004
rows.name: Yet I fear Tree Clan will grumble at this.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev052601_MSG2005
rows.name: I am grateful for trust. But I need more time to decide.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev052601_MSG0050
rows.name:
Situation with Tree Clan is still volatile.
Slightest thing wakens their rage.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev052601_MSG0051
rows.name:
I thought we might see eye to eye one day.
But Tree Clan are not as forgiving as Earth aliens.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev052601_MSG0052
rows.name: I fear we will never get along.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev052601_MSG0053
rows.name:
You defeated Luxaar. But our struggle has continued
for 10,000 suns. It is eternal.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev052601_MSG0054
rows.name: So be it. If Tree Clan wants fight, they will get fight.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev052601_SEL3011
rows.name: Ask Slovity what she will do next.

rows.label: tev052601_SEL3021
rows.name: Ask Slovity about recent developments.

rows.label: tev052601_MSG3001
rows.name: I will not stop until every member of Ganglion is dead.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev052601_MSG3002
rows.name:
But your chieftain Maurice asked me to be one of you.
Asked me to become BLADE.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev052601_MSG3003
rows.name:
It makes sense. I often find myself fighting with BLADEs.
Why not join for true?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev052601_MSG3004
rows.name: Look how many Tree Clan also want to join![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev052601_MSG3005
rows.name:
I never imagined standing with Tree Clan.
Especially to protect city built by Earth aliens.
It sounds like madness.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev052601_MSG3006
rows.name: But madness has strange appeal to it...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev052601_MSG0055
rows.name:
Tree Clan have finally let go of hostility.
Good riddance![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev052601_MSG0056
rows.name: Life is easier this way.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev052601_MSG0057
rows.name:
Though we will still fight. We always fight!
Every day![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev052601_MSG0058
rows.name:
But not bloodbaths of old. Not wars of 10,000 suns.
We will fight for sport. Fight fair![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev052601_MSG0059
rows.name:
I am lucky to have sparring partner like Oche.
Maybe you can go round with us sometime.
...If you think you can handle it. Ha ha ha![ST:wait ]
